column5: a buddy of mine called me up and asked me if i wanted to go out and troll for some muskies in the morning on LSC  i said of course s0 430 is coming quick and i hope i have some pictures to prove it ill remember the camera  anyways i guess ill take a day off from fixing up the smokercraft and enjoy a good day on the water  happy fishing
good luck  i love battlin a nice ski at sunrise
thanks dude a report will come quick  when i get back
I'm almost as excited as you are!!!! Have fun man!!!!  God Bless!!

we to would be heading out right now but we have the Kids fishing clinic here in Belle river so another day on shore it should be a great day as the temps will be nice for everyone. Good luck chasing slime but then again you should already have 2 hours in by now.

well got on the lake at 520 launched out at the sandbar  we got the planer boards set up running woodies  trolled and trolled somemore but no slime  switched up baits almost every 30 minutes anyways before heading back in i picked this nice little smallie up got off the water at 1030 it was nice just getting out  lake was beautiful
